text: Lierna view of Bellagio (also known as Lierna vista su Bellagio) is a 19th- century late impressionist painted in oil by Bruno or Bruto Mazzolani. It was painted in 1925, in Via Roma Lierna, Italy on Lake Como. == Description == The painting by Bruto Mazzolani, represents a view of Lake Como from the shore of Lierna overlooking the promontory of Bellagio, while women wash their clothes in the waters on the shore of Lake Como. == Related pages == * Bruto Mazzolani Category:1920s paintings
title: Lierna view of Bellagio (Mazzolani)
